api_data.job_title: Required Accounts Executive for Travel Co at Lajpat Nagar

jd_information.description: Urgently Required Account Executive for Travel Co at Lajpat Nagar. Candidate Should have 2-5 yrs of experience in Accounts in any travel Co. Should have full accounting and taxation knowledge. Should know GST.  Should know Yatra softwareGross Salary: 20K-25K (can go up as per last salary)Job Location: Lajpat nagar-IInterested candidates can meet at J.J.INDIA, B-108, 2nd Floor, Lajpat Nagar, Part-1, New Delhi-110024 Ph: 9811008929, Email: info@jjindia.co.in
